dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni had made her way outside and was staring out of the nearby window with a determined look on her face.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: You finally ready? We can hunt for the Villain today.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Hunt for the Villain? What is she talking about?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni-Chan what do you mean we can hunt for the Villain?

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Takeshi-Kun. This school is not normal...I am not sure if you had already noticed it, but there are people here that are beyond just slightly different...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Does this mean Chuuni realises some of the strange happenings at this school? Some part of me can’t actually believe it considering it is her...But on the other hand maybe she does realise what is going on?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: What kind of people are we talking about?

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Dangerous people...My eye can see it.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I could see Chuuni’s determination. She seemed to really believe this story, so maybe she is not making this up at all?
